text: India Gate is a 2000 Indian Malayalam film, directed by T. S. Saji, starring Devan and Vani Viswanath in the lead roles. http://www.filmibeat.com/malayalam/movies/india-gate.html ==Cast== *Vani Viswanath as Parvathy Sharma/Gayathri Vishnu Dathan *Charan Raj as CI Vishnu Dathan *Bheeman Raghu as Willams *Jagadish as CI Mohandas *Shammi Thilakan as Sharath *Devan as Viswanathan *Spadikam George as Vavachan *Hemanth Ravanan as Pollachi Thevar *Jose Pellissery as Rana Settu *Narayanankutty as Azhakappan *M. S. Thripunithura as Swamy *Kochu Preman as Naduvettam Sreeshaileshan Swami *Sadiq as Kanakadas *Augustine as Const. Jagathnathan *Nandulal as Nandan *Kollam Ajith as Vimalraj *Ponnamma Babu *Salim Kumar as Const. Thamarakshan ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: India Gate (film)
